conversations.value: Before: ../data/train_dir_new/113_31_stressed/n.jpg After: ../data/train_dir_new/113_31_stressed/p.jpg You are a psychology expert, I need you to identify whether the subject in the video is stressed. Lets think step by step. First, please find facial actions of the subject in this video.

The facial actions can be listed below:
eye: open normally, eyelids not drooping or tightly closed
eyebrows: relaxed and straight
nose: central, no particular movement
lip: closed, neutral expression, corners neutral
cheek: relaxed
jaw: not tensed
neck: not tensed, head straight and facing forward
then assess if the subject is stressed.
